testcase.name:
test_
id='c7Ag55'
os=Alpine
'timeout in wait_thread.value results in timed_out status and any captured stdout/stderr are not part of run_cyber_dojo_sh result'

test_
id='c7Ag56'
os=Alpine
'
 in capture3_with_timeout()
 when process.spawn() fails to respond within the timeout period
 thats also a timeout
 and no process.detch() call is made
 and no process.kill() call is made
 '

test_
id='c7Ag57'
os=Alpine
'in capture3_with_timeout() when process.kill(:TERM,-pid) completes then wait_thread.join() returns non nil and the process.kill(:KILL, -pid) call is not made'

test_
id='c7Ag58'
os=Alpine
'in capture3_with_timeout() when there is no timeout'
